text: Unión Deportiva Puçol is a Spanish football team based in Puçol, in the autonomous community of Valencia. Founded in 1951 it plays in Regional Preferente – Group 1, holding home games at Estadio José Claramunt, which has a capacity of 2,000 spectators. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1951–80 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1980/81 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1981/82 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|16th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1982/83 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"| !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1983–98 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1998/99 |style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1ª Reg. |style="background:#25A8F9;"|6th !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1999/00 |style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1ª Reg. |style="background:#25A8F9;"| !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2000/01 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Reg.
